Literature.Title: A short peptide with selective antibiofilm activity against Pseudomonas aeruginosa and Klebsiella pneumoniae carbapenemase-producing bacteria.
Literature.Author: Cardoso MH, Santos VPM, Costa BO, Buccini DF, Rezende SB, Porto WF, Santos MJ, Silva ON,  Ribeiro SM, Franco OL

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=<640 µg/ml,Human fibroblasts MRC-5:IC50=320 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa H1001(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(no activity data),Klebsiella pneumoniae KPC 001825971(no activity data),Klebsiella pneumoniae KPC 002210477(no activity data),Escherichia coli KPC 001812446(0-10% Inhibition=64µg/ml)
